recipe.title: Whiskey Sour
ingredients: 1 orange or lemon slice or peel
instructions: Combine all ingredients except the fruit slice or peel and cherry in a cocktail shaker and shake vigorously. Strain into a sour or Delmonico glass and garnish with the fruit and cherry.
